name: ReMoDDeD
savepath: This is another small update for you guys (even though it was large effort for me, heh) that adds the ability to change your in-game UI theme. I know not everyone is the biggest fan of the red, so now you can choose the retail UI or 6 different color varations of our mod's UI. In order to use this feature, version 2.5.5+ of D2RLaunch or version 1.1.5+ of D2RLAN is needed. Please enjoy this aesthetic improvement!

Demon Tempering is a new system that allows you to combine body parts found from special monsters with special unique items to create a brand new item, with it's own special characteristics. This is an entirely new item quality; Tempered. Please both enjoy this dynamic system as well as be patient with it's future iterations. More info on this new addition can be found on our Discord and in your recipe menu.
